casebody.data:
STATE v. HERNANDEZ No. COA04-1156. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed September 20, 2005. Certification Date October 10, 2005. Appeal from Wake (00CRS21056, 00CRS21057, 00CRS21058, 00CRS21059, 00CRS22726).

Case reported without published opinion. Remanded for new suppression hearing; Motion for appropriate relief denied.
